abstract: The billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn has bought the remaining half of the $500 million mortgage on the three Trump Entertainment Resorts casinos that he is trying to buy out of bankruptcy.
snippet: The billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn has bought the remaining half of the $500 million mortgage on the three Trump Entertainment Resorts casinos that he is trying to buy out of bankruptcy.
lead_paragraph: The billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn has bought the remaining half of the $500 million mortgage on the three Trump Entertainment Resorts casinos that he is trying to buy out of bankruptcy, The Associated Press reports. He also won a $10 million interest payment in the transaction.

headline.main: Icahn Now Owns Entire Mortgage on Trump Casinos
